alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 10:18AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:05 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.6 feet Wednesday evening. It will then rise to 17.6 feet Wednesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
